description: This file implements a Flutter widget called DashboardTab, representing a dashboard screen with market overview, alerts, signals, and coaching tips. It manages state, fetches data from a MarketProvider, and builds a UI with various components.

classes.name: DashboardTab
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the main dashboard tab in the app.

classes.name: _DashboardTabState
classes.description: State class managing the UI and behavior of the DashboardTab widget.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state, sets up post-first frame callback to load market data and start polling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, displaying market info, alerts, signals, and coaching tips.
